articles.author: Kerry Flynn, CNN Business
articles.title: Anna Wintour has long reigned supreme at Condé Nast. Now it's official - CNN
articles.description: Anna Wintour now has an even loftier title at Condé Nast. The company on Tuesday promoted the editor of Vogue to chief content officer of Condé Nast, a position where she will oversee all brands including international editions.
